summary: In a future where energy is made from fecal matter, the government rewards defecation with "juicybars". Small-time hustlers try to get rich while fending off the mutated Diaper Gang.
cast: Nick Ainsworth|Hyeon-yeong|Zack Keller|Gyu-hwa Lee|Gyu-hyeong Lee|Chang Jung Lim|In-yong Oh|Hye-jeong Seo|Hae-chol Shin|Ed Skudder
director: Directors: Jo Beom-jin, Zack Keller | 1 more credit »
title: Aachi & Ssipak
